subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort was built by Raja Ratan Singh of Kachhwaha clan?
question_hi: राजा रत्न सिंह के कलनवाली मंदिर किस लोग बनाया गया है?
explanation_en: Amber Fort was built by Rao Jodhua, whereas Mehrangarh Fort was built by Rao Jodha.
explanation_hi: अमेरिका मंदिर बना राजोड़ू सपैलिंगर मंदिर बना राजगढ़ सपैंगर मंदिर बना राजोड़ सपैंगर मंदिर
explanation_en: Amber Fort was built by Rao Jodhua, while Mehrangarh Fort was built by Rao Jodha.
explanation_hi: अमेरिका मंदिर बना राजोड़ सपैंगर मंदिर
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort is located in Jodhpur, Rajasthan, while Amber Fort is located in Jaipur, Rajasthan.
